A dialog with Swedish Green Party

23 Feb 2022

The Climate Emergency is here, we have to Act Now. How can politicians join force with the citizens? What is blocking the path for political action? And how can we deal with the resistance to shift? These and many more intriguing and timely questions were part of Mikael Granberg and my dialog with the Milj枚partiet de groena (Swedish Green Party) in Karlstad, Sweden. One thing was clear that dialogs between researchers and politicians are now needed more than ever before.

Posted by Avit K. Bhowmik
